title: Microsofts new businesses shine but PC software still sags
text:
Microsoft's new businesses shine, but PC software still sags 
State Journal Friday 23rd October, 2015 
(AP Photo/Richard Drew, File). FILE - In this Oct. 6, 2015, file photo, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella closes a presentation of new devices in New York. Microsoft reports quarterly financial results Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015.
